org.apache.james.smtpserver.jmx

Class HookStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.StandardMBean
      • org.apache.james.smtpserver.jmx.HookStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicMBean, MBeanRegistration, Disposable, HookStatsMBean

    public class HookStats
extends StandardMBean
implements HookStatsMBean, Disposable
    JMX Bean which keep track of statistics for a given Hook
